snippet: Measles killed a Clallam County woman in the spring, the first such death in the United States in 12 years, officials said Thursday.
abstract: Dept of Health in Washington State reports that woman has died of measles in Clallam County, first fatality of disease in United States in 12 years.
lead_paragraph: Measles killed a Clallam County woman in the spring, the first such death in the United States in 12 years, officials said Thursday.
